{"step_by_step_thinking": "Shelf life of an impression material refers to the duration for which it can be stored without losing its properties. Poly ether has a good shelf life. Addition silicone, also known as polyvinyl siloxane, has an excellent shelf life. Condensation silicone also has a good shelf life. Polysulphide, however, has the shortest shelf life among these materials due to its tendency to oxidize and lose its properties over time.", "answer_choice": "D. Polysulphide"}
